meanings.definition: The quality of being fair and sensible.
meanings.sent2: In negotiations, it is important to consider reasonablenesses.
meanings.sent3: The debate over the cake size reached a peak of reasonablenesses.
meanings.sent4: His argument lacked reasonablenesses, falling apart like a house of cards.
